column4: when I type smb://domain I can see the windows computer but not the ubuntu computer (the one I'm on) do I need to add something to the smb.conf file to broadcast the ubuntu computer?
you can see the ubuntu computer but not the windows computers?
Sorry I misread. I don't have any Windoze computers. :D
when I type smb://domain I can see the windows computer but not the ubuntu computer (the one I'm on) do I need to add something to the smb.conf file to broadcast the ubuntu computer?
I do have an Ubuntu computer with Wine installed and lots of Windoze games though.
